means: 参加( attend的过去式和过去分词 )
[常用被动语态]（作为结果、情况）伴随

sentence.Network_en: The Ball was attended by the cream of Hollywood society.
sentence.Network_cn: 好莱坞的大牌影星们出席了那个舞会。

sentence.Network_en: They attended college together at the University of Pennsylvania.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们一起就读于宾夕法尼亚大学。

sentence.Network_en: Jack had attended these meetings as a matter of routine for years.
sentence.Network_cn: 数年来，杰克把参加这些会议当成是例行公事。

PerfectNetExp.abs: his injury was attended to by a young doctor ., 他的伤由一位年轻医生医治.
have you ever attended the makeup classes ., 您曾经参加过补考吗.

our school attended the trainings pilot school – Chongqing College of Electronic Technology , such as industry liaison , CBT , competency standard , curricular plan , and so on , 28 in all .组织人员按时、积极地参加了项目学校——重庆电子科技职业学院组织的关于项目成果推广专业的行业调研、能力本位教学、能力标准、课程方案及
the city's youth representatives all walks of life and volunteers the 4th All-China Games , totaling over 500 , attended the meeting .全市各界青年代表和四体会赛会志愿者代表共500余人参加了大会。

高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... positive adj 肯定的；积极的 attend vt 出席；！参加；上（大学等） △ rehearse vt 预演；排演.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... resistance 抵抗 attendance 出席，到场 expectance 期待，期望.
niki-study blog - niki-study - 网易博客 ... 1.appointment 约会，约定 2.attendance 出席人数；出席 3.cabinet 橱柜.

entry.def: If you attend a meeting or other event, you are present at it.

example.ex: Thousands of people attended the funeral...
The meeting will be attended by finance ministers from many countries...
example.tran: 很多国家的财政部长将出席会议。

entry.def: If you attend an institution such as a school, college, or church, you go there regularly.

example.ex: They attended college together at the University of Pennsylvania.
example.tran: 他们一起就读于宾夕法尼亚大学。

entry.tran: 处理，料理（事情）；照顾，护理（受伤的人）
entry.def: If you attend to something, you deal with it. If you attend to someone who is hurt or injured, you care for them.

example.ex: The staff will helpfully attend to your needs...
example.tran: 工作人员会帮忙满足您的需求。

example.ex: There are more pressing matters to be attended to today...
example.tran: 今天有更紧急的事情要处理。

means.word_mean: 1. having accompaniment or companions or escort;

sentences.sentence: "there were lone gentlemen and gentlemen accompanied by their wives"

means.word_mean: 2. having a caretaker or other watcher

Sentence.sentence: She attended the supermarket's grand opening ceremony.
